channel.title: Html5 on MyThinkPond
channel.description: Recent content in Html5 on MyThinkPond

item.title: Minimal Maintainable HTML5 Page - Template - index.html
item.description: Sometimes I keep searching for a starter HTML5 “hello-world” - index.html page. So I thought I’d blog about it so that others who need it can also take advantage of it. [sourcecode language=“jscript”] <!DOCTYPE html> Sample HTML5 index.html from MyThinkPond Sample HTML5 index.html from MyThinkPond.wordpress.com [/sourcecode] Feel free to copy and use as needed. At some point of time, you’re going to need something more than a ‘hello-world’ and when you cross that road go download the “HTML5 Boilerplate”.
